aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.paragraph_one: Hello, I'm Alla - Frontend developer from Moscow. I am interested in development and everything connected with it.
aboutMe.paragraph_two: I am studying Frontend development courses at IT-INCUBATOR.
aboutMe.paragraph_three: Ready to implement great projects with wonderful people.

skills.title: Skills
skills.code: With HTML, I can structure content and create semantic structure, making web pages more accessible and understandable for search engines and users.
skills.css: With CSS, I can create unique and interactive designs that enhance the user experience.
skills.react: I develop dynamic and responsive user interfaces using React. This library allows me to create powerful and flexible web applications that are easily scalable.
skills.typescript: I use TypeScript to add static typing to JavaScript, making my code more reliable and easier to understand. TypeScript helps me avoid errors and improve the quality of development.
skills.styledComponents: With Styled Components, I style components in React, allowing me to write CSS within JavaScript. This makes my work more intuitive and manageable, ensuring a consistent style throughout the application.
skills.figma: Figma allows me to collaborate effectively with designers, obtain precise specifications, and implement them in code, making the development process more productive and accurate.

contacts.title: Contacts
contacts.description: Want to know more or just chat? You are welcome!
